fields.fieldName: Maximum Download Speed Offered at Location Post-Investment
fields.helpText: Provide the maximum download speed offered/advertised at this location.

fields.fieldName: Maximum Download Speed Delivered at Location Post-Investment
fields.helpText:
Provide the maximum download speed delivered at this location as confirmed by speed tests at the location, conducted upon completion of the construction and initiation of operations. Speed tests should be conducted in a manner consistent with industry best practices to account for the actual speeds delivered during peak use times in the given area.

More details regarding the required approach for gathering maximum download speed delivered can be found in the Connect America Fund, WC Docket No. 10-90, Order, 33 FCC Rcd 6509 (WCB/WTB/OET 2018) (Performance Measures Order); Connect America Fund, Order on Reconsideration, WC Docket No. 10-90, 34 FCC Rcd 10109 (2019) (Performance Measures Reconsideration Order).

fields.fieldName: Maximum Upload Speed Offered at Location Post-Investment
fields.helpText: Provide the maximum upload speed offered/advertised at this location.

fields.fieldName: Maximum Upload Speed Delivered at Location Post-Investment
fields.helpText:
Provide the maximum upload speed delivered at this location as confirmed by speed tests at the location, conducted upon completion of the construction and initiation of operations. Speed tests should be conducted in a manner consistent with industry best practices to account for the actual speeds delivered during peak use times in the given area.
